AI Description: Star-Fusion is a computational tool developed to identify fusion transcripts from RNA-Seq data. It utilizes the STAR aligner to map reads and searches for evidence of chimeric transcripts, providing insight into gene fusions in cancer and other diseases.
Core Features:
1. Detection of fusion transcripts from RNA-Seq data
2. Utilizes the STAR aligner for read mapping
3. Identifies chimeric transcripts for downstream analysis
4. Useful for studying gene fusions in cancer and related diseases
General Tags: RNA-Seq, Fusion Transcripts, Gene Fusions, Computational Tool
